chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> trace_correct (revert_trace tr)

Premises:
revert_trace = fun base_params : BaseParams => fix revert_trace (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) : list (Net.input * Net.output) := match tr with | [] => [] | (_, t) :: tr' => (match t with | inl _ => [] | inr l => filterMap (fun x : PB_output => match x with | RequestResponse i os => Some (i, os) | ReadResponse _ => None end) l end ++ revert_trace tr')%list end : forall base_params : BaseParams, list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> list (Net.input * Net.output) Arguments revert_trace {base_params} _%list_scope
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init_handler : data; input_handler : input -> data -> list output * data } Definition init_handler : forall P : BaseParams, SingleParams P -> data.
step_async_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_async : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), step_relation network (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) Arguments step_async_star {P params}
Inductive name : Set := Primary : name | Backup : name
Inductive output : Set := Response : key -> option value -> option value -> output
step_async_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => {| nwPackets := []; nwState := init_handlers |} : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network Arguments step_async_init {P params}
Inductive input : Set := Put : key -> value -> input | Get : key -> input | Del : key -> input | CAS : key -> option value -> value -> input | CAD : key -> value -> input
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> Net.data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Inductive trace_correct : list (input * output) -> Prop := TCnil : trace_correct [] | TCApp : forall (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) None = (v, o) -> trace_correct (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)]) Arguments trace_correct _%list_scope Arguments TCApp _%list_scope
simulation : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> step_1_star init (revert_state net) (revert_trace tr)
inputs_1_m_revert : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> inputs_m tr = (inputs_1 (revert_trace tr) ++ queue (nwState net Primary))%list
transformer : forall P : list (Net.input * Net.output) -> Prop, (forall (st : Net.data) (tr : list (Net.input * Net.output)), step_1_star init st tr -> P tr) -> forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> P (revert_trace tr)
pbj_0_or_1 : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> zero_or_one_outputs_per_step_trace tr
pbj_NOABT : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> no_output_at_backup_trace tr
inductive_simulation : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr -> step_1_star (revert_state net) (revert_state net') (revert_trace tr)
correspond_reachable : forall (net : network) (tr_m : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr_m -> forall (st : Net.data) (tr_1 : list (Net.input * Net.output)), step_1_star init st tr_1 -> inputs_1 tr_1 = inputs_m tr_m -> correspond st (nwState net) tr_1 tr_m
network_invariant_inductive : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr -> network_invariant net -> network_invariant net'
outputs_m_revert_trace : forall tr : list (name * (Net.input + list PB_output)), no_output_at_backup_trace tr -> outputs_m tr = outputs_1 (revert_trace tr)
step_async_outputs_m : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr -> inputs_m tr = [] /\ outputs_m tr = [] /\ nwState net Primary = nwState net' Primary \/ inputs_m tr = [] /\ (exists os : Net.output, outputs_m tr = [os]) \/ (exists i : Net.input, inputs_m tr = [i])
step_ordered_ind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output)) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
step_ordered_sind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output)) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
inputs_m_inr : forall (h : name) (t : list Net.output) (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), inputs_m ((h, inr t) :: tr) = inputs_m tr
correspond_inductive : forall (net net' : network) (tr_m' : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr_m' -> forall (st st' : Net.data) (tr_m : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) (tr_1 tr_1' : list (Net.input * Net.output)), correspond st (nwState net) tr_1 tr_m -> step_1_star st st' tr_1' -> inputs_1 tr_1' = inputs_m tr_m' -> correspond st' (nwState net') (tr_1 ++ tr_1') (tr_m ++ tr_m')
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_network -> list Net.name * ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [ |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_network -> list Net.name * ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [ |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output)) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [ |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [ |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [ |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = (xs ++ p :: ys)%list -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = (xs ++ p :: ys)%list -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = (xs ++ p :: ys)%list -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = (xs ++ p :: ys)%list -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
inputs_m_on_cons : forall (t : name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), inputs_m (t :: tr) = (let (n, s) := t in match n with | Primary => match s with | inl (Request i) => i :: inputs_m tr | _ => inputs_m tr end | Backup => inputs_m tr end)
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = (xs ++ p :: ys)%list -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = (xs ++ p :: ys)%list -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
correspond_Prefix : forall (st : Net.data) (net : network) (tr_1 : list (Net.input * Net.output)) (tr_m : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), correspond st (nwState net) tr_1 tr_m -> Prefix (outputs_m tr_m) (outputs_1 tr_1)
Inductive step_ordered (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation ordered_network (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output)) := StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms ->...-> step_ordered net net' tr Arguments step_ordered {P params} Arguments StepOrdered_deliver {P params} _ [net'] [tr]%list_scope [m] [ms out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope _ [to] Arguments StepOrdered_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [tr out]%list_scope [inp d] [l]%list_scope
StepOrdered_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output))) (out : list Net.output) (inp : Net.input) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered net net' tr where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + Net.output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list Net.output) (d : Net.data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec to (update2 Net.name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered net net' tr where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [ |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [ |- FailureParams ?P]
